sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT QUAY_CD , QUAY_PLANDRAFT , QUAY_NM , QUAY_LT , QUAY_USAGE_DRAFT , QUAY_DPWT , QUAY_CSDHP_POSBL_SHIP_QY , QUAY_MTHD , QUAY_LNL_ABLTY , QUAY_POSESN_SE , QUAY_TS_YN , PRT_AT_CODE , QUAY_GROUP_CD , QUAY_RELM_GISCD , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT FROM QUAY_CD_F WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# AND RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(1) TOTCNT FROM QUAY_CD_F WHERE 1 = 1
